events.name: Live Music Night
events.description: Join us for an unforgettable night of live music performances by local artists. Enjoy great music, food, and drinks in a vibrant atmosphere.

events.name: Valentine's Day Special
events.description: Celebrate love with a romantic dinner set in our beautifully decorated dining area. Special menu and offers for couples.

events.name: Trivia Night
events.description: Test your knowledge and compete with friends in a fun and interactive trivia night! Prizes for the winning team.

events.name: Karaoke Party
events.description: Sing your heart out at our karaoke party! Grab the microphone and perform your favorite songs with friends.

events.name: Food & Drink Tasting Event
events.description: A guided tasting experience featuring a selection of gourmet food and premium drinks. Perfect for foodies and connoisseurs alike.
